Des_Plaines.Niles West High School: Niles West High School, or NWHS, is a public four-year high school located in Skokie, Illinois, a north suburb of Chicago, in the United States. It is part of Niles Township Community High School District 219, which also includes Niles North High School, and Niles East High School. Its school teams were originally the Indians, but this was later changed in 2001 to the Wolves.
